characterDescription:
Hoid is former King Elhokar's Wit and entertainer,* and is a recurring mysterious character in the cosmere who existed before the gods of the various worlds were created, and was involved in that situation. It has been hinted that he was a rogue student of Silverlight University. He has abandoned his real name.
It is virtually impossible to keep anything from Hoid/Wit. He knows useful, important things.
